Class Agent

java.lang.Object
  market.Agent
All Implemented Interfaces:
NodeWrapper
public class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
implements NodeWrapper

The idea is that "free" Agents are not in any Loyalty scheme program (for example). They can be used for free-market simulations etc. Observes a product It is observed by event?

setIdentifier

public void setIdentifier(java.lang.String identifier)
Note that identifier should *not* be used to characterize a customer-supplier relationship (eg SilverCard). For this kind of characterization, you should use a relationship with customer-supplier (see createLinkedAgentCollection for generating Array of such customers)

Parameters:
identifier - This should define the Agent as what s/he is. Eg "Reseller" or "FinalCustomer".
